mlflex.core
Class LearnerConfig

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.core.LearnerConfig

public class LearnerConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores information that is configured for a given learner. For example, it helps ML-Flex know how to interface with third-party software packages.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

Constructor Detail

LearnerConfig

public LearnerConfig(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.String learnerClassName,
                     java.lang.String commandTemplate)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor.

Parameters:
key - Unique name to reference the learner
learnerClassName - Full name of the ML-Flex Java class that extends mlflex.learners.AbstractMachineLearner that contains the logic for interfacing with the learner
commandTemplate - Template (where applicable) that is used to interface with an external software package at the command line
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
